item.title: GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages
item.description: Setting Up Actions Major Caveat!!! At the time of this writing there was a… major inconvenience. Basically, there are some restrictions that prevent Github actions from being able to publish GitHub Pages. To work around this I had to monkey around different git configurations. The fact that my site uses submodules made it even more cumbersome. Nonetheless, it worked and here is how I did it. Step 1.
